Who am i?

I'm Utsho Momen, a Developer / Designer / Engineer

Hi there! I have been very passionate about computers and programming since my university life. I dream to be an expert software engineer so that I can build professional and useful software that has business value. I am looking for a junior software engineer position in a reputed software company that can help me to achieve my goal.
